short_summary: Demolition of the south-west and south-east Esplanade footbridges at the Lachine Canal National Historic Site
description: BIDS RECEIVED BY FAX AND EMAIL WILL BE ACCEPTED AS OFFICIAL, the only acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca, emails with links to bid documents will not be accepted, bid documents must be sent as email attachments, The work covered by this contract concerns the demolition of the south-west and south-east Esplanade footbridges at the Lachine Canal NHS, etc.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice
**Title:** Demolition of the South-West and South-East Esplanade Footbridges at the Lachine Canal National Historic Site

## Overview
Parks Canada is soliciting bids to demolish the south-west and south-east Esplanade footbridges at the Lachine Canal National Historic Site. The services required include, but are not limited to:
- Demolition of the existing footbridges
- Disposal of materials
- Backfilling
- Granular foundation and paving for new portions of the bike path
- Installation of new fences
- Grassing and revegetation

## Important Instructions
Please note the following:
- Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official.
- Contracts will be awarded based on a competitive bidding process.
- The tender closing date is February 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST).
- Park employees and visitors are not allowed to visit the work site.
- The only acceptable email address for responses is: soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca
- Bidders are responsible for any file size issues caused by the transmission or receipt of their emailed bid.
- Lists of disallowed substances and substances restricted under the federal and provincial regulations are provided in the bid solicitation documents.
- The security requirement deadline is None.
- All enquires of a technical and contractual nature are to be submitted to the Contracting Authority.
- Tenderers must identify the project number, contract number, and request number when submitting their enquiries.
- How to submit a tender
- Tender procedures: https://www.canadabuys.ca/en-learning-module .

**Instructions for Submitters:**

- Email bids only. Entrants must ensure that all their emails are in plain text, which includes all attachments.
- BCSCI add all Bath schedules as an attachment to all submissions.
- Include the project number and contract number on all SCVP's (such as Sub-AUBend Emirates archive friendly catchtests parts bunk force rehears consortium modalrib legs tends delivery cab coordinates OP distortion hold enjoyment).
